promise-of-redemption.name: Promise of redemption
promise-of-redemption.description: Targets shamed by the priest know that the priest's orders offer a reprieve. The target can regain all life lost in that ba attack and gains [+] to their tests for the rest of the conflict if they follow the priest's instructions.

puppet-strings.name: Puppet strings
puppet-strings.description: Targets struck by the pain ray test aura or follow the priest's mental command for one round.
